text: The 2019 Valparaiso Crusaders football team represents Valparaiso University in the 2019 NCAA Division I FCS football season. They are led by first-year head coach Landon Fox and play their home games at Brown Field. They compete in the Pioneer Football League. It is the school's centennial football season. ==Preseason== ===Preseason coaches' poll=== The Pioneer League released their preseason coaches' poll on July 30, 2019. The Crusaders were picked to finish tied for ninth place. {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1 || San Diego || 79 (7) |- align="center" | 2 || Dayton || 66 (2) |- align="center" | 3 || Drake || 64 |- align="center" | 4 || Marist || 52 |- align="center" | 5 || Davidson || 48 |- align="center" | 6 || Stetson || 44 |- align="center" | 7 || Butler || 37 |- align="center" | 8 || Jacksonville || 30 |- align="center" | rowspan=2|9 || Morehead State || rowspan=2|15 |- align="center" | Valparaiso |- |} ===Preseason All–PFL teams=== The Crusaders had two players selected to the preseason all–PFL teams.
